segments.text: Could I trouble you for a minute , Mr . Graham ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , Emily . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like to leave a few minutes early today . Would that be all right ?
segments.speaker: S1
